page.title: 05Recreation in Salem
page.content: {CLUBS:-} Women's Institute, Hall Committee, Darts (Angel Inn), Mothers and Toddlers group, Keep Fit/Yoga. (All in {Memorial Hall }unless stated) {EVENTS:- Annual Village Sports, }in field next to hall, courtesy of Aberdaunant Farm. {ENTERTAINMENT:- } Occasional Welsh concerts at Hall, musical groups at the Angel Inn, Whist Drives (Hall), Lamb Roasts (at surrounding farms) The village has few amenities for entertainment, but the W.I. organises various courses for the Winter months. Many people own horses, and {Taliaris {Mansion } is a small riding centre, with lessons and riding holidays available. The road that runs through the top four squares of the area is a popular rally route for motor clubs from out of the district.
